subject: Urgent Attention needed
body:
Dear IntelliDesk Support,
This is an urgent issue.
Since this morning, multiple customer tickets are stuck in the “Pending”
state and are not getting assigned to agents automatically. This is causing
SLA breaches on our end.
Impact:

   - Affected Tickets: ~47
   - Business Impact: High
   - Priority: Critical

Please escalate this to the engineering team immediately and share an ETA
for resolution.
Awaiting your prompt response.
Regards,
Hemant Pathak
Customer Support Manager

subject: Charged Twice for Monthly Subscription
body:
Hello IntelliDesk Support Team,

I was charged twice for my monthly IntelliDesk Pro subscription for January
2026. I can see two identical transactions on my credit card statement
dated 22 January.

Account Email: user.john@example.com
Invoice ID (if required): INV-98231

Please look into this and let me know how soon the extra charge can be
refunded.

Thanks in advance for your help.

Best regards,
Hemant Pathak
